scenario_text.value: So all of you guys ended up on your own, too?

Yeah, I was alone when I woke up. I couldn’t
even find Agumon, so I was really worried.

Yeah, I know what you mean... It’s really
scary.
Aoi and Saki went through the same thing.

Still, everyone faced their fears, didn’t
give up, and met up with their partners.
We’re with you, so you can do the same, Miu!

I’m scared, but I won’t give up. Just watch
me!
